entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 2:46 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 8.
